title: CU Fringe Festival Fund
description: To fund expenses related to the operations and marketing of CU Fringe, a festival of free student created performance art, including theater, dance, acapella, improv, and film pieces.
marketingContent: To fund expenses related to the operations and marketing of CU Fringe, a festival of free student created performance art, including theater, dance, acapella, improv, and film pieces.
